full_summary:
### Solicitation Notice

#### Solicitation Title
TAV1 Rear Axle Shaft, Driver's Side
Arbre d’essieu arrière du VTB 1, côté conducteur 

#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: 202403006
* Publication Date: 12 June 2024
* Closing Date and Time: 27 June 2024 at 14:00 h EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

#### Tender Details
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking quotations for the supply and delivery of twenty (20) TAV1 Rear Axle Shafts, driver's side, in Ottawa, Ontario. The preferred delivery date is on or before November 29, 2024.

Bids must comply with the requirements of the solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract (1 contract).

#### Tender Submission
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at:

73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R2
Attention: Sonya Dupont
Email: Sonya.Dupont@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please refer to the attached tender documents or contact:

Sonya Dupont
Procurement Officer
Royal Canadian Mounted Police
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R2
Phone: (343) 571-0500
Email: Sonya.Dupont@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

#### Indigenous Procurement
The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company's visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.

#### Disclaimer
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
